DOC.brief_summary: The Zenith® p-Branch™: Single-Center Study is a clinical trial approved by Swedish Regulatory Authority to study the safety and effectiveness of the Zenith® p-Branch™ in the treatment of abdominal aortic aneurysms.
DOC.criteria: Pararenal or juxtarenal AAA >5.0 cm in diameter Pararenal or juxtarenal AAA with history of growth >0.5 cm/year Age < 18 years Life expectancy < 2 years Pregnant or breast feeding Inability or refusal to give informed consent by the patient or a legally authorized representative Unwilling or unable to comply with the followup schedule Additional medical restrictions as specified in the Clinical Investigation Plan Additional anatomical restrictions as specified in the Clinical Investigation Plan
